unit.utterance: Aval sare sobh bud bad yek āqāyi dāšt golābi mičid
unit.utterance_translation: It was early in the morning, a man was picking pears
then he went, he was on the tree
picked the pears and climbed down

unit.utterance: bad yekišān rā pāk kard va bāz raft bālā
unit.utterance_translation: he cleaned one of the them, and climbed up again

unit.utterance: bad yek āqāye digar bā yek bozi dastaš bud rad šod az piše golābihā
unit.utterance_translation: there was another man with a goat, he passed the baskets of pears

unit.utterance: bad in āqāyi ke rad šod yek pesar bačeyi bā dočarxe āmad piše golābihā bad did ba inke did
unit.utterance_translation: afterwards, a boy came with a bike and saw the basket

unit.utterance: az piše golābihā ke dāšt rad mišod istād
unit.utterance_translation: while he was passing by the pears, he stopped

unit.utterance: negāhi be golābihā kard va bā inke did sāhebaš bālā ast
unit.utterance_translation: looked at them and although he found the gardner on the tree

unit.utterance: bad yeki az in sabadhāye golābi rā gereft bā xodaš bord
unit.utterance_translation: he took one of the baskets and went away

unit.utterance: bad tuye rāh yek doxtar bačei bā dočarxe dāšt miyāmad kolāhaš oftād
unit.utterance_translation: on his way, a little girl was coming on her bike, her hat fell down

unit.utterance: bad gir kard be čarxe in pesar bače pesar bače zamin xord
unit.utterance_translation: the bike stuck with the hat, and fell down

unit.utterance: bad se tā pesar bačeye digar istāde budand
unit.utterance_translation: there were three boys standing right there

unit.utterance: ke āmadand komakaš kardand golābihā rā tuye jabe gozāštand
unit.utterance_translation: who came to help him gather up the pears

unit.utterance: bad komakaš kardand ke beravad in ham dāšt miraft sedāšān zad yekišān āmad
unit.utterance_translation: they helped him to go and when he was about to go, he called them, one of the came back

unit.utterance: ānhā ham gereftand va raftand bad az piše hamān mardi ke golābihā vāsaš bud rad šodand
unit.utterance_translation: they took the pears, went away while passing the man whose pears they were eating

unit.utterance: mard ham ānhā rā negāh kard va tamum šod
unit.utterance_translation: man looked at them and the movie came to an end
